s.text: True, there are some cuts in expenditures and personnel.
What is most striking to a person who has been reading budgets for a long time is how far the cult of presidential personality has progressed.

We want them to live out their dreams, empowered with the tools they need to make the most of their lives and to build a future where America remains the world's beacon of hope and freedom and opportunity.
The budget still has the president's message and a section organized according to the functions of government.
Readers knew there was going to be a fair measure of boasting and self-serving in that section.
